news.title: Justia Webinars: Attorneys’ Duties Towards Clients When Using Technology
news.description: With today’s digitally-driven landscape, lawyers increasingly rely on various technologies to improve efficiency, accuracy, and client service. As technology becomes more crucial to your day-to-day duties, so too do your responsibilities and the ethical standards that need to be maintained. As they say, with great power comes great responsibility!

news.title: News and Notes From Google Local Services Ads: April 2024
news.description: Attention lawyers using Google Local Services Ads! Stay ahead of the curve with the latest updates for legal practices. news.title: Justia Legal Resources: DUI/DWI Law Center
news.description: Drunk driving costs far too many lives each year. People convicted of DUI or DWI may face severe consequences. The DUI & DWI Law Center in the Justia Legal Guides explains the basics of the law in this area.
